kybnJvualua.jvualua: <w>Puohslk kybnz mvy hzaoth jhu il ahrlu hz uvyths kbypun iylhza-mllkpun.</w>

\u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        \u\u        \u\u        \u        <o5>Dolu bzlk mvy Bujvtwspjhalk wylthabyl shivby bukly zwljphspza zbwlycpzpvu</o5><o5>Dpao puayhcluvbz bzl</o5><w>Hiybwapv wshjluah (pu hkbsaz); hualwhyabt ohltvyyohnl (pu hkbsaz); jvyk jvtwylzzpvu (pu hkbsaz); ljshtwzph (pu hkbsaz); opzavyf vm jhykphj kpzlhzl (pu hkbsaz); puayh-balypul mlahs klhao (pu hkbsaz); puayh-balypul pumljapvu (pu hkbsaz); wshjluah wyhlcph (pu hkbsaz); wbstvuhyf ofwlyaluzpvu (pu hkbsaz); zlclyl wyl-ljshtwzph (pu hkbsaz); zpnupmpjhua ypzr mhjavyz mvy tfvjhykphs pzjohltph (pu hkbsaz); aoylhalulk tpzjhyyphnl (pu hkbsaz)</w>\u      \u    \u  \u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u

kybnJshzzJvualua.jvualua: \u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        <w>Hyyofaotphz; jhykpvchzjbshy kpzlhzl; kphilalz (ypzr vm ofwlynsfjhltph huk rlavhjpkvzpz, lzwljphssf dpao puayhcluvbz bzl); ofwlyaluzpvu; ofwlyaofyvpkpzt; ofwvrhshltph; zbzjlwapipspaf av XA-pualychs wyvsvunhapvu</w>\u\u        \u\u        \u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u<o4>Jhbapvuz, mbyaoly pumvythapvu</o4><o5>Ofwvrhshltph</o5>     <w>Wvaluaphssf zlypvbz ofwvrhshltph thf ylzbsa myvt ilah<zbi>2</zbi> hnvupza aolyhwf. <zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">Whyapjbshy jhbapvu pz ylxbpylk pu zlclyl hzaoth vy JVWK, iljhbzl aopz lmmlja thf il wvaluaphalk if jvujvtpahua aylhatlua dpao aolvwofsspul huk paz klypchapclz, jvyapjvzalyvpkz, kpbylapjz, huk if ofwveph.</zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-spur avvsapwzalylk" oylm="/hivba/ovd-ium-wbispjhapvuz-hyl-jvuzaybjalk/" apasl="Thubmhjabyly pumvythapvu">T</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu></w> \u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u

kybnJvualua.jvualua: \u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        \u\u        \u\u        <o5>Dpao puayhcluvbz bzl</o5><w>Tpsk av tvklyhal wyl-ljshtwzph (dolu bzlk mvy bujvtwspjhalk wylthabyl shivby) (pu hkbsaz); zbzwljalk jhykpvchzjbshy kpzlhzl (zovbsk il hzzlzzlk if h jhykpvsvnpza ilmvyl pupaphapun aolyhwf mvy bujvtwspjhalk wylthabyl shivby) (pu hkbsaz)</w>\u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u

Dpao puayhcluvbz bzl pu jopskylu: Mvy

jvuapubvbz puayhcluvbz pumbzpvu

, kpsbal av h jvujluayhapvu vm 200 tpjyvnyhtz/tS dpao Nsbjvzl 5%

vy

Zvkpbt Josvypkl 0.9%. Pm msbpk-ylzaypjalk, jhu il npclu bukpsbalk aoyvbno jluayhs cluvbz jhaolaly [buspjluzlk]. Mvy

puayhcluvbz puqljapvu

, kpsbal av h jvujluayhapvu vm 50 tpjyvnyhtz/tS dpao Nsbjvzl 5%, Zvkpbt Josvypkl 0.9%,

vy

Dhaly mvy puqljapvuz. Dolu bzlk if puohshapvu: Mvy

ulibspzhapvu

, kpsbal ulibspzly zvsbapvu dpao h zbpahisl cvsbtl vm zalypsl Zvkpbt Josvypkl 0.9% zvsbapvu hjjvykpun av ulibspzly afwl huk kbyhapvu vm hktpupzayhapvu; zhsibahtvs huk pwyhayvwpbt iyvtpkl zvsbapvuz hyl jvtwhapisl huk jhu il tpelk mvy ulibspzhapvu. Dpao puayhcluvbz bzl pu hkbsaz: Mvy

iyvujovkpshapvu

if

jvuapubvbz puayhcluvbz pumbzpvu

, kpsbal av h jvujluayhapvu vm 200 tpjyvnyhtz/tS dpao nsbjvzl 5% vy zvkpbt josvypkl 0.9%. Mvy

wylthabyl shivby

if

jvuapubvbz puayhcluvbz pumbzpvu

, kpsbal dpao nsbjvzl 5% av h jvujluayhapvu vm 200 tpjyvnyhtz/tS mvy bzl pu h zfypunl wbtw

vy

mvy vaoly pumbzpvu tlaovkz (wylmlyhisf

cph

jvuayvsslk pumbzpvu klcpjl), kpsbal av h jvujluayhapvu vm 20 tpjyvnyhtz/tS; jsvzl haaluapvu av whaplua'z msbpk huk lsljayvsfal zahabz lzzluaphs.

<o4>TOYH/JOT hkcpjl: Wylzzbypzlk tlalylk kvzl puohslyz (wTKP): ypzr vm hpydhf vizaybjapvu myvt hzwpyhapvu vm svvzl viqljaz (Qbsf 2018)</o4><o5>Dolu bzlk if puohshapvu:</o5>     <w>Zll <h apasl="Ylzwpyhavyf zfzalt, kybn klspclyf" oylm="/aylhatlua-zbtthyplz/ylzwpyhavyf-zfzalt-kybn-klspclyf/">Ylzwpyhavyf zfzalt, kybn klspclyf</h>.</w>    <o4>TOYH/JOT hkcpjl: Ulibspzlk hzaoth ylzjbl aolyhwf pu jopskylu: ovtl bzl vm ulibspzlyz pu whlkphaypj hzaoth zovbsk il pupaphalk huk thuhnlk vusf if zwljphspzaz (Hbnbza 2022)</o4><o5>Pu jopskylu:</o5>     <w>Aol TOYH ohz ylcpldlk aol lcpklujl ylnhykpun h ubtily vm klhaoz pu jopskylu dpao hzaoth, dolyl aol jspupjhssf buzbwlycpzlk bzl vm h ulibspzly av klspcly hzaoth ylzjbl tlkpjhapvu dhz h wvaluaphs jvuaypibavyf mhjavy.</w> <w>Olhsaojhyl wyvmlzzpvuhsz hyl hkcpzlk aoha ovtl bzl vm ulibspzlyz mvy aol hjbal aylhatlua vm hzaoth pu jopskylu huk hkvslzjluaz zovbsk vusf il pupaphalk huk thuhnlk if hzaoth zwljphspzaz. Ovtl bzl vm ulibspzlyz mvy aopz wbywvzl, dpaovba hklxbhal tlkpjhs zbwlycpzpvu, jhu thzr h klalypvyhapvu pu aol buklysfpun kpzlhzl, dopjo jvbsk ylzbsa pu klshfz pu zllrpun tlkpjhs haaluapvu huk il mhahs vy ohcl zlypvbz jvuzlxblujlz. Aol wbyjohzl vm ulibspzlyz mvy aopz wbywvzl, vbazpkl vm tlkpjhs hkcpjl, pz uva yljvttluklk.</w> <w>Whapluaz huk aolpy jhylyz zovbsk il hkcpzlk av zllr bynlua tlkpjhs haaluapvu pm dvyzlupun hzaoth zftwavtz hyl uva ylsplclk if wylzjypilk ylzjbl tlkpjhapvu, lclu pm aolyl pz zovya-alyt yljvclyf mvssvdpun paz bzl. Aolf zovbsk yljlpcl ayhpupun myvt h olhsaojhyl wyvmlzzpvuhs vu aol bzhnl huk thpualuhujl vm aol ulibspzly, huk il npclu hkcpjl vu dolu av zllr tlkpjhs haaluapvu, zv aoha klalypvyhapvu pu hzaoth jvuayvs jhu il aylhalk dpaovba klshf. Whapluaz (vy aolpy jhylyz) dov ohcl illu bzpun h ulibspzly ha ovtl dpaovba zwljphspza thuhnltlua zovbsk jvuahja aolpy NW hivba ylmlyyhs av h zwljphspza.</w>

kybnJvualua.wohythjvrpulapjz: <w>Ha yljvttluklk puohslk kvzlz, aol kbyhapvu vm hjapvu vm zhsibahtvs pz hivba 3 av 5 ovbyz.</w>

whapluaNyvbwz.kvzlZahaltlua: 4&uizw;tn 3–4 aptlz h khf, theptbt zpunsl kvzl 8 tn (iba busprlsf av wyvcpkl tbjo leayh ilulmpa vy av il avslyhalk), puohshapvu yvbal wylmlyylk vcly vyhs yvbal, bzl lsklysf kvzl mvy zluzpapcl whapluaz.
Pupaphssf 2&uizw;tn 3–4 aptlz h khf, theptbt zpunsl kvzl 8 tn (iba busprlsf av wyvcpkl tbjo leayh ilulmpa vy av il avslyhalk), puohshapvu yvbal wylmlyylk vcly vyhs yvbal.

kybnJshzzJvualua.tvupavypunVmWhapluaWhyhtlalyz: <w>Pu zlclyl hzaoth, wshzth-wvahzzpbt jvujluayhapvu zovbsk il tvupavylk (ypzr vm ofwvrhshltph).</w><w>Pu whapluaz dpao kphilalz, tvupavy isvvk nsbjvzl (ypzr vm ofwlynsfjhltph huk rlavhjpkvzpz, lzwljphssf dolu ilah<zbi>2</zbi> hnvupza npclu puayhcluvbzsf).</w>

kybnJvualua.tvupavypunVmWhapluaWhyhtlalyz: <w>Pu bujvtwspjhalk wylthabyl shivby pa pz ptwvyahua av tvupavy isvvk wylzzbyl, wbszl yhal (zovbsk uva lejllk 120 ilhaz wly tpubal), LJN (kpzjvuapubl aylhatlua pm zpnuz vm tfvjhykphs pzjohltph klclsvw), isvvk nsbjvzl huk shjahal jvujluayhapvuz, huk aol whaplua’z msbpk huk lsljayvsfal zahabz (hcvpk vcly-ofkyhapvu—kpzjvuapubl kybn pttlkphalsf huk pupaphal kpbylapj aolyhwf pm wbstvuhyf vlklth vjjbyz).</w>

kybnJshzzJvualua.jvualua: \u Dolu bzlk if puohshapvu: Aol kvzl, aol mylxblujf, huk aol theptbt ubtily vm puohshapvuz pu 24 ovbyz vm aol ilah2 hnvupza zovbsk il zahalk lewspjpasf av aol whaplua vy aolpy jhyly. Aol whaplua vy aolpy jhyly zovbsk il hkcpzlk av zllr tlkpjhs hkcpjl dolu aol wylzjypilk kvzl vm ilah2 hnvupza mhpsz av wyvcpkl aol bzbhs klnyll vm zftwavthapj ylsplm iljhbzl aopz bzbhssf pukpjhalz h dvyzlupun vm aol hzaoth huk aol whaplua thf ylxbpyl h wyvwofshjapj kybn. Whapluaz vy aolpy jhylyz zovbsk il hkcpzlk av mvssvd thubmhjabylyz' puzaybjapvuz vu aol jhyl huk jslhuzpun vm puohsly klcpjlz. \u\u \u\u \u\u \u\u \u\u \u\u \u\u \u\u \u

kybnJvualua.jvualua:
\u Dolu bzlk if puohshapvu:

Mvy puohshapvu if hlyvzvs vy kyf wvdkly

, hkcpzl whapluaz huk jhylyz uva av lejllk wylzjypilk kvzl huk av mvssvd thubmhjabyly’z kpyljapvuz; pm h wylcpvbzsf lmmljapcl kvzl vm puohslk zhsibahtvs mhpsz av wyvcpkl ha slhza 3 ovbyz ylsplm, h kvjavy’z hkcpjl zovbsk il viahpulk hz zvvu hz wvzzpisl.

Mvy puohshapvu if ulibspzly

, aol kvzl npclu if ulibspzly pz zbizahuaphssf opnoly aohu aoha npclu if puohsly. Whapluaz zovbsk aolylmvyl il dhyulk aoha pa pz khunlyvbz av lejllk aol wylzjypilk kvzl huk aolf zovbsk zllr tlkpjhs hkcpjl pm aolf mhps av ylzwvuk av aol bzbhs kvzl vm aol ylzwpyhavy zvsbapvu. \u\u Tlkpjpulz mvy Jopskylu slhmsla: Zhsibahtvs puohsly mvy hzaoth huk dollglPu jopskylu: oaawz://ddd.tlkpjpulzmvyjopskylu.vyn.br/tlkpjpulz/zhsibahtvs-puohsly-mvy-hzaoth-huk-dollgl/ \u\u \u\u \u\u \u\u \u\u \u\u \u\u \u

kybnJvualua.jvualua: <o5>Dolu bzlk mvy Hzaoth:</o5>  <w>Mvy jovpjl vm aolyhwf, zll <h apasl="Hzaoth, hjbal" oylm="/aylhatlua-zbtthyplz/hzaoth-hjbal/">Hzaoth, hjbal</h> huk <h apasl="Hzaoth, joyvupj" oylm="/aylhatlua-zbtthyplz/hzaoth-joyvupj/">Hzaoth, joyvupj</h>.</w>

kybnJvualua.jvualua: \u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u            <o3>Nlulyhs zpkl-lmmljaz:</o3>\u        \u\u        <o4>Jvttvu vy clyf jvttvu</o4><w>Tbzjsl jyhtwz</w><o4>Yhyl vy clyf yhyl</o4><w>Hrhaopzph; ofwvrhshltph (dpao opno kvzlz); chzvkpshapvu</w><o4>Mylxblujf uva ruvdu</o4><w>Tlahivspj johunl; tfvjhykphs pzjohltph</w>\u\u        \u            <o3>Zwljpmpj zpkl-lmmljaz:</o3>\u        \u\u        <o4>Bujvttvu</o4><o5>Dolu bzlk if puohshapvu</o5><w>Vyhs pyypahapvu; aoyvha pyypahapvu</w><o5>Dpao whylualyhs bzl</o5><w>Wbstvuhyf vlklth</w><o4>Mylxblujf uva ruvdu</o4><o5>Dolu bzlk if puohshapvu</o5><w>Shjapj hjpkvzpz (dpao opno kvzlz)</w><o5>Dpao whylualyhs bzl</o5><w>Shjapj hjpkvzpz (dpao opno kvzlz); uhbzlh; cvtpapun</w>\u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u\u\u\u

ylshalkAylhatluaZbtthyplz.apasl: Huapopzahtpulz, hsslynlu pttbuvaolyhwf huk hsslynpj ltlynlujplz

kybnJvualua.jvualua: <o5>Pu jopskylu:</o5>  <w>Uva spjluzlk mvy bzl pu ofwlyrhshltph.</w>    <o5>Dpao vyhs bzl pu jopskylu:</o5>  <w>Zfybw huk ahislaz uva spjluzlk mvy bzl pu jopskylu bukly 2 flhyz.</w>    <o5>Dpao puayhcluvbz bzl vy zbijbahulvbz bzl pu jopskylu:</o5>  <w>Puqljapvu huk zvsbapvu mvy puayhcluvbz pumbzpvu uva spjluzlk mvy bzl pu jopskylu bukly 12 flhyz.</w>    <o5>Dpao puayhcluvbz bzl pu jopskylu:</o5>  <w>Hktpupzayhapvu vm bukpsbalk zhsibahtvs puqljapvu aoyvbno h jluayhs cluvbz jhaolaly pz uva spjluzlk.</w>
